hotels.title: Chic Mercure Langkawi Island Escape near Cenang Beach with Tranquil Pool & Luxe Spa
hotels.description: Sophisticated style and laidback elegance converge at this Mercure sanctuary on the Malaysian island of Langkawi, a stone's throw from the powder-soft sands of Cenang Beach. Soak up the coastal charms and indulge in a variety of water sports, stroll through the vibrant beach town, and visit local restaurants and bustling markets. Spend your days lounging by the hotel's expansive pool, tuck into Malaysian and international delicacies at Rice Garden restaurant and cool off with cocktails at 99 Islands Lounge and Bar. If you need some pampering, head to the spa and treat yourself to restorative treatments before retreating to your stylish room.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Beachfront Langkawi Glamour with Onsite Dining, Pools & Spa
hotels.description: Experience white-sand beaches, ancient rainforests and azure waters with a luxurious stay at The Danna Langkawi - a member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World. Set in a prime beachfront position, this colonial-style hotel puts the best of the island's west coast at your fingertips. Spend hours lazing in a cabana by the three-tiered infinity pool - the largest on the island - or enjoy an indulgent treatment at The Danna Spa. Explore the island’s natural treasures with exotic bird watching, tours of Southeast Asia’s first UNESCO Global Geopark, or home-cooked meals in a local family’s home. With its unparalleled location between lush greenery, glorious hills and pristine sandy beaches facing the Andaman Sea, you are spoilt for choice. Fill your days with unforgettable experiences - ride the Langkawi Cable Car, tee off at The Els Club Golf Teluk Datai, cruise into the sunset on a party dinner cruise, explore mangrove rivers or go bird watching with Junglewalla.

hotels.title: Secluded Malaysia Private Island Retreat with Beachfront Dining, Bars & Serene Spa
hotels.description: Dive deep into luxurious island living with a stay at the tropical paradise of Rebak Island Resort & Marina, Langkawi. This serene retreat calls Rebak Island home, a private island in the heart of Malaysia's Langkawi archipelago, just a short boat ride from the vibrant mainland. Enjoy waking to the sounds of the beach just steps from your plush king bed, and the tranquility of being surrounded by lush rainforest. When you’re not exploring the magnificent island, dine on exquisite local cuisine at Senari Sea View Restaurant, or simply unwind with a cocktail at the Beach Bar, all while soaking up breathtaking views of the strait of Malacca.
